09:31		 Search for R-Parity Violating Production of Single Sneutrinos in $e^{+}e^{-}$ Collisions at $\sqrt{s}$ = 189-209 GeV / Heister, A ; Schael, S ; Barate, R ; Bruneliere, R ; et al [CERN-EP-2001-094] [hep-ex/0201013]
A search for single sneutrino production under the assumption that $R$-parity is violated via a single dominant $LL\bar{E}$ coupling is presented. [...]
